articles.title: OnePlus now offers up to a whopping 6TB of cloud storage in India for OnePlus 9 Pro purchases - XDA Developers
articles.description: OnePlus is offering an additional 5TB of cloud storage to Indian OnePlus 9 Pro users as part of its Red Cable Pro Life loyalty program.
